front.title: FrodoKEM: key encapsulation from learning with errors

abstract.t: This internet draft specifies FrodoKEM, an IND-CCA2 secure Key Encapsulation Mechanism (KEM). About This Document This note is to be removed before publishing as an RFC. Status information for this document may be found at https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/draft-longa-cfrg-frodokem/. Source for this draft and an issue tracker can be found at github.com/dstebila/frodokem-internet-draft.
